channel.description: Recent content in flickr on Leonardo Faria

item.title: Pikeo, um Flickr com Flex
item.description: Pikeo é um novo serviço web2.0 powered by France Telecom e construído com Flex 2. Será que rodará o espaço do Flickr?

item.title: Vários ícones que valem uma palavra
Fast Flickr
item.description: Fast Flickr is my first WordPress plugin. This plugin shows a set of Flickr easily, with Lightbox 2 suport. USAGE: Download the plugin. Copy Fast Flickr folder into wp-content/plugins. Active in Plugins Panel In sidebar.php, paste: <?php fastflickr("Set id", "Show title of set: false or true","Show description: false or true"); ?> EXAMPLE: <?php fastflickr("72157594168783620", 1, 1); ?> FAST FLICKR IN ACTION (WITHOUT TITLE, DESCRIPTION AND CSS): There are 3 CSS classes in this code: .
